shortDescription:
Show everyone what adventure really looks like by capturing your own exhilarating feats and wild outdoor explorations with ExploreOne's 4K Action Camera with Wi-Fi. With this compact device, you can document your favorite experiences as they unfold in 4K video or in stills with resolutions up to 20M photo. The camera's waterproof housing allows you to go where the action leads without having to stop and store it'should you encounter damp conditions. It also comes with mounting accessories for handlebars and helmets so you can keep your hands free and stay in the moment.

Features
  • 4K HD Camera
  • Waterproof Case
  • Tripod, Floating Handle
  • Flat Adhesive Mounts
  • Handle Bar/Pole Mount
  • Frame Housing Mount
  • Straps, Long Thumb Screw
  • Quick Release Buckle
  • Pivot Mounts
  • Short Thumb Screw
  • USB Cable
  • MicroFlash Card and Adapter
Specifications
  • Display: 2.0 (50.8 mm) inch display
  • Lens: 140° wide angle
  • Language s: English/Traditional Chinese/Simplified Chinese/Russian/Portuguese/Spanish/ Japanese/German/French/Polish/ Italian
  • Resolution of photos: 20 M(by interpolation), 16 M(by interpolation), 12 M(by interpolation), 8M, 5M
  • Resolution of videos: 4K @ 30FPS (by interpolation), 2.7K @ 30FPS (by interpolation), 1080p @ 60FPS, 1080p @ 30FPS, 720p @ 120FPS, 720p @ 60FPS
  • Video format: MP4
  • Video compression format: H.264
  • Storage: Micro Flash card up to 64 GB
  • Shooting mode: Self-timer (3s/5s/10s/20s), Auto(3s/10s/15s/20s/30s), Burst Photo(3P/S, 5P/S, 10P/S)
  • Frequency of optical source: 50Hz/60Hz
  • USB interface: USB 2.0
  • Rated voltage: DC 5V 1A
  • Battery capacity: Li-ion 3.7V 750mAh
  • Recording time: About 90 minutes (at 4K)
  • Charging time: About 3-4 hours
  • Dimension: 2.33 x 1.62 x 1.19 in. (59.3 x 41.1 x 30.2 mm)
  • Operating system: Windows/Linux/Unix/Win7/Mac OS
  • WiFi Function: Yes
  • Weight: 1.2 lbs
- SKU: EPST1108

groups.shortDescription:
For less than the price of a weekly coffee, you can receive one year of Premium Tech Support & Security powered by True Network Solutions. Our US-based tech experts are available 24/7 by phone, chat, or email to assist you when you need it!


For only $99, this $400 value includes unlimited support for all the tech you own â€” computers, smart home products, printers, routers, tablets, and more.


What's included with this 1-year service?

  • McAfee Total Protection to defend against viruses & online threats
  • Unlimited 24/7 1-on-1 tech coaching and tech support with live multi-lingual US-based Tech Experts
  • Unlimited virus removal for up to 10 devices
  • Initial Setup service and ongoing support for any of your tech products, no matter where you bought them
  • Access to 1 Data Recovery service: if your computer suffers a data loss, we can recover it free of charge*
  • Unlimited troubleshooting, software support, and PC tune-ups


Questions? Call (316) 776-4357 to learn more from our friendly tech team.



How do I receive service?

Simply add this service to your cart and check out. Once purchased, you'll receive an email from True Network with the information needed to initiate service at your convenience. You'll be able to call, email, or chat 24/7/365 with a US-based tech expert


How long do I receive service for?

This is a one-year service plan and does not auto-renew.


True Satisfaction

True Network Solutions is committed to making sure every customer is happy with our services! We'll do everything possible to make sure our customers are 100% satisfied. If you would like to provide feedback on your experience or encounter any issues, we're ready to listen. Contact our Customer Service team 24/7 at (316) 776-4357.


* We use commercially reasonable efforts to attempt to recover your lost data and files using both basic and advanced methods. Methods include but are not limited to current software and hardware techniques available as well as proprietary techniques developed for data recovery.
